hero.description: YearWheel makes your annual planning clear, unified and easy to act on. See the whole year at once, spot gaps and conflicts instantly – all with AI assistance.

mobileMessage.title: Best on Larger Screens
mobileMessage.description: YearWheel is optimized for tablets, laptops, and desktop computers for the best experience.
mobileMessage.demoNote: Interactive demos are shown on screens from 768px and up

demo.manualDescription: Click, drag, and organize your activities exactly as you want them.
demo.aiTitle: Or let the AI do the work
demo.aiDescription: Describe what you want to achieve – the AI creates the structure, adds activities, and suggests improvements.

features.title: Everything you need for professional planning
features.subtitle: From strategy to execution – YearWheel gives you the tools to keep your team in sync

aiAssistant.title: AI Planning Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Describe what you want to accomplish in natural language – AI creates the structure, adds activities, detects conflicts, and suggests improvements automatically.

googleIntegration.title: Google Integration
googleIntegration.description: Sync activities directly from Google Calendar and Google Sheets. Import automatically and distribute across multiple years – everything updates in real-time.

circularOverview.title: Circular Overview
circularOverview.description: See months, weeks, and days in an intuitive wheel. Discover seasonal peaks and resource spikes that easily disappear in traditional calendars.

realTimeCollaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
realTimeCollaboration.description: Create teams, share wheels, and work together. See who's online and get real-time updates when the team makes changes.

smartRings.title: Smart Rings
smartRings.description: Organize activities in rings. Put goals in inner rings and daily activities in outer ones. Color-code for clarity.

highQualityExport.title: High-Quality Export
highQualityExport.description: Export as PNG, SVG, PDF, or JPG. Use directly in presentations, board meetings, or print and hang on the wall.

pricing.title: Simple pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free and upgrade when you need more

premium.name: Premium
premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For teams and organizations that need advanced planning
features: All export formats (PNG, SVG, PDF, JPG)
Share wheels and collaborate in real-time

ngoDiscount.title: Nonprofit or NGO?
ngoDiscount.description: We support nonprofit organizations and NGOs in their important work. Contact us for a 50% discount coupon on the Premium plan.

pricing.flexibility: No commitment • Cancel anytime • 30-day money-back guarantee
pricing.billingNote: * Prices shown in EUR for reference. Actual billing is in SEK (10.9 SEK = €1).

tryPremium.question: Can I try Premium for free?
tryPremium.answer: Yes! Create a free account and start using the basic version. You can upgrade to Premium whenever you want.

dataAfterCancel.question: What happens to my data if I cancel Premium?
dataAfterCancel.answer: Your wheels and data remain intact. You can continue using the free version with limited features.

aiAssistant.question: How does the AI assistant work?
aiAssistant.answer1: The AI assistant uses advanced language understanding to help you plan faster. Simply describe what you want to accomplish in natural language, e.g:
aiAssistant.example1: Create a campaign in March and copy it to September
aiAssistant.example3: Add 10 meetings evenly distributed over the first quarter
aiAssistant.answer2: The AI automatically creates activities, detects conflicts, and suggests improvements.

googleIntegration.question: What is Google Integration?
googleIntegration.answer1: With Premium, you get access to automatic synchronization from:
googleIntegration.calendar: Google Calendar: Import events directly to your year wheel
googleIntegration.sheets: Google Sheets: Sync activities from your spreadsheets
googleIntegration.answer2: The system automatically distributes activities across multiple years based on dates, and updates in real-time when you make changes in Google.

changePlan.question: Can I switch between monthly and annual billing?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can switch between monthly and annual billing at any time in your subscription settings.

securePayments.question: Are my payments secure?
securePayments.answer: Absolutely! We use Stripe for all payments - one of the world's most trusted payment platforms. We never store your card details.

cta.title: Ready to start planning?
cta.subtitle: Create your free account today and discover how easy planning can be

aiDemo.placeholder: Write what you want to plan...
aiDemo.hint: + Natural language • AI understands context • Automatic planning

userMessages.message1: Create a campaign in the second week of March
userMessages.message3: Copy that campaign and place it in September

footer.tagline: Make annual planning simple, clear and effective for the whole team.

templates.title: Get inspired by real-world examples
templates.description: Our templates are based on actual plans from companies and organizations. Regardless of industry - education, HR, marketing or finance - there's a template that matches your needs. Use them as inspiration for your year wheel.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Create your first year wheel today
